Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $125 for this product. This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, during which you can return the product for a full refund if it doesn't meet your expectations. I trust that you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
